ğŸ› ï¸ Dependencies & Installation
Ollama (LLM Model API)
Ollama must be installed and running locally to serve AI queries.

Install Ollama (Linux):

curl -fsSL https://ollama.com/install.sh | sh
Start server:

ollama serve
Download model:

Model pull:
ollama pull llama3.2
ollama pull deepseek-r1

Confirm API running at http://localhost:11434

Docker Image Creation:
The content pack relies on the following Docker image to ensure that all dependencies are properly integrated using the XSOAR UI CLI:

/docker_image_create name=AIDockerImage base="demisto/python3:3.12.8.1983910" dependencies="langchain,ollama,langchain_community,langchain_ollama,deepseek"

This command creates a Docker image based on the demisto/python3:3.12.8.1983910 base image, ensuring that all necessary dependencies like LangChain, Ollama, LangChain Community, LangChain Ollama, and DeepSeek are included and ready for use.
